mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM declaration WHERE date(inputdate) = date(NOW())
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM declaration WHERE outputdate IN('0000-00-00')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM declaration WHERE WEEKOFYEAR(inputdate) = WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())
SELECT WEEKOFYEAR(inputdate) AS weekNum, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM declaration GROUP BY weeknum ORDER BY weeknum DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT cnt, weeknum FROM ( SELECT AVG(timestampdiff(minute,inputdate,outputdate)) AS cnt, WEEKOFYEAR(inputdate) as weeknum FROM declaration WHERE outputdate NOT IN ('0000-00-00') GROUP BY weeknum ORDER BY weeknum desc LIMIT 5) as t order by weeknum
SELECT reason, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM declaration GROUP BY reason

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalcnt FROM declaration WHERE (outputdate IN('0000-00-00') or outputdate is null) ) AS c, ( SELECT wno, declaration.boardname, fno, declaration.id AS uid, inputdate, reason, freeboard.id AS writer, title, writeno, outputdate FROM declaration, freeboard WHERE (declaration.boardname=freeboard.boardname) AND (declaration.fno=freeboard.writeno) AND (outputdate IN('0000-00-00') or outputdate is null) UNION select wno, declaration.boardname, fno, declaration.id AS uid, inputdate, reason, inforerrorboard.id AS writer, title, writeno, outputdate FROM declaration, inforerrorboard WHERE (declaration.boardname=inforerrorboard.boardname) AND (declaration.fno=inforerrorboard.writeno ) AND (outputdate IN('0000-00-00') or outputdate is null) ORDER BY inputdate DESC ) as d LIMIT #{start},10;

SELECT wno, declaration.boardname, fno, declaration.id AS uid, inputdate, reason, freeboard.id AS writer, title, writedate FROM declaration, freeboard WHERE (declaration.boardname=freeboard.boardname) AND (declaration.fno=freeboard.writeno) AND (outputdate IN('0000-00-00') or outputdate is null) UNION select wno, declaration.boardname, fno, declaration.id AS uid, inputdate, reason, inforerrorboard.id AS writer, title, writedate FROM declaration, inforerrorboard WHERE (declaration.boardname=inforerrorboard.boardname) AND (declaration.fno=inforerrorboard.writeno ) AND (outputdate IN('0000-00-00') or outputdate is null) ORDER BY inputdate DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT wno, a.boardname boardname, fno, a.id, inputdate, reason, details, b.id writer, title, content, writedate, views, isvisible, outputdate FROM (SELECT * FROM declaration WHERE wno=#{wno}) AS a, (SELECT * FROM freeboard WHERE boardname=#{boardname} AND writeno = #{fno} union SELECT * FROM inforerrorboard WHERE boardname=#{boardname} AND writeno = #{fno}) AS b

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) totalcnt FROM declaration WHERE outputdate not IN('0000-00-00')) AS c, ( SELECT declaration.wno, declaration.boardname, fno, declaration.id AS uid, inputdate, reason, freeboard.id AS writer, title, outputdate FROM declaration, freeboard WHERE (declaration.boardname=freeboard.boardname) AND (declaration.fno=freeboard.writeno) AND outputdate not IN('0000-00-00') UNION select declaration.wno, declaration.boardname, fno, declaration.id AS uid, inputdate, reason, inforerrorboard.id AS writer, title, outputdate FROM declaration, inforerrorboard WHERE (declaration.boardname=inforerrorboard.boardname) AND (declaration.fno=inforerrorboard.writeno ) AND outputdate not IN('0000-00-00') ORDER BY outputdate DESC ) as l limit #{start}, 10;
mapper.insert: insert into declaration(fno, boardname, id, inputdate, reason, details) values(#{writeno}, #{boardname},#{id},now(),#{reason},#{details})
